product_name: REI CoolMax Eco Multisport Crew Socks - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The moisture-wicking and quick-drying REI Multisport Crew socks use CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) fabric, made from recycled plastic bottles, to keep feet comfortable. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability, and spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Mesh-knit toe and instep panels promote airflow and move moisture away from skin, keeping feet dry and blister free. Fully cushioned bottoms and heels absorb shock and protect against wear. Lin Toe(R) ''no feel'' seams reduce irritation and chafing along toes. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The moisture-wicking and quick-drying REI Multisport Crew socks use CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) fabric, made from recycled plastic bottles, to keep feet comfortable.
